product_overview: Global Expat Premium Marketplace is a luxury online platform tailored for the international expat community. It blends a sophisticated design system with subtle cultural elements and modern technological aesthetics, serving various global regions with localized experiences. The marketplace enables verified users to buy and sell premium products while providing robust user management, real-time communication, and multi-currency support.
core_goals: Provide a premium, trustworthy, and culturally sensitive marketplace experience for global expats.
Enable secure and smooth authentication with multi-tier verification and role-based access control.
Facilitate premium product listing, browsing, and purchasing with advanced filtering and search capabilities.
Support real-time buyer-seller messaging to enhance communication.
Ensure administrative oversight and management for maintaining marketplace quality and compliance.
Deliver a visually consistent, mobile-responsive, accessible, and performant platform.
Incorporate multi-currency and multi-language support aligned with regional localization and cultural adaptation.
Implement tiered premium memberships and verification systems to boost seller trust and buyer confidence.
key_features: JWT-based user authentication system with email/OTP verification and social login integration.
Comprehensive user profile management including expat-specific preferences and verification status.
Featured product marketplace with category navigation, multi-faceted filtering, and a premium badge system.
Shopping cart system maintaining persistent item storage and management.
Real-time messaging system between buyers and sellers with conversation tracking.
Multi-tier verification system covering user identity and organizational email verification.
Seller-centric features including product listing creation, management dashboard, and premium seller badges.
Admin dashboard for platform management with tools for monitoring overdue listings and sending notifications.
Reusable UI components library built on Radix UI and shadcn/ui for consistent design.
Responsive header navigation with currency toggle, authentication actions, messaging, and mobile support.
Multi-currency support for international payments with currency toggling.
Homepage hero carousel displaying rotating featured categories and trust indicators.
Cultural and regional adaptations with traditional pattern overlays and localized color themes.
Progressive Web App approach ensuring excellent mobile responsiveness and performance.
Loading skeletons and lazy-loading components for enhanced user experience.
Comprehensive error handling and validation to ensure platform robustness.
user_flow_summary: Users access the platform and can browse marketplace listings without logging in.
Users log in via email-based OTP or social accounts; new users are auto-registered.
Verified buyers gain enhanced privileges such as sending messages to sellers.
Sellers register and submit verification documents through onboarding forms, then create and manage product listings via their dashboard.
Buyers browse, filter, and search product categories and listings, viewing premium badges and detailed product pages.
Buyers and sellers communicate in real-time through the messaging interface.
Admins monitor long-standing listings, send notifications, and archive inactive items to maintain quality.
Users manage profiles, preferences, verification status, and premium memberships via account pages.
Homepage features dynamic hero carousel with category highlights, trust indicators, and CTAs for selling or joining premium membership.
validation_criteria: Authentication must securely support JWT with role-based access and OTP verification.
User verification status implementation must be accurate and reflect in buyer privileges.
Product listing creation, editing, and archiving workflows must function as specified including image validation.
Real-time messaging system must support seamless message sending and notifications.
Admin functionalities for monitoring and managing overdue listings must be operational and well-logged.
The UI must adhere to the Design System colors, typography, and spacing specified in the implementation guide.
Responsive design must pass usability tests across desktop, tablet (768px), and mobile (375px).
Accessibility standards WCAG 2.1 AA compliance must be met for all major components.
Currency switching and multi-language support must be functional and tested for major markets.
Platform must exhibit smooth performance with lazy loading, error handling, and loading states implemented.
